text.p: Michael Foods Inc said Wednesday it completed the previously announced acquisition of Papetti's Hygrade Egg Products Inc and its affiliates for about $82.8 million, including about 3.2 milion shares of Michael Foods common stock.
Michael Foods also assumed about $23.4 million of Papetti's debt.
Papetti's, based in Elizabeth, N.J., is a processed egg products producer with annual sales exceeding $300 million.
Michael Foods is a diversified food processor and distributor.

In a related development, Michael Foods said it completed a $125 million private placement of senior notes. It will use the proceeds to finance the Papetti's acquisition as well as to refinance debt assumed in both that transaction and in a pending merger with North Star Universal Inc.
The notes, placed with various insurance company investors, mature in February 2009. They were priced to yield 7.58 percent.
